mapper.select: select b.driver, b.num, b.email, b.nick, b.content, b.reg_date, m.imglocation from HB_Board b, hb_member m where b.email=m.email and num=(select max(num) from HB_Board where driver=#{driver})
mapper.insert: insert into HB_Board values (#{driver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hb_boardseq.nextVal, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update HB_Board set content=#{content} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select * from HB_member where email=#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select channel_id from HB_Channel where driver=#{driver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from hb_passengers where driver=#{driver} and email=#{email}

mapper.select: select c.crewid, c.crewname from hb_crewmember m, hb_crew c where m.crewid=c.crewid and m.email=#{driver}

select count(*) from hb_station where email=#{driver}
